attributes.name: forceSelect
attributes.description:
Whether or not to force selection of options as a separate action.
If this is set, focusing on an option will not select it. You have to press "Space" to select the option.
If this is unset, focusing an option will select it.
Note that this will be ignored if the `aria-multiselectable` attribute is set to `"true"`.

attributes.name: aria-multiselectable
attributes.description: Sets whether the listbox is in single-select or multi-select mode.

attributes.name: aria-readonly
attributes.description: Sets the listbox to readonly mode - in readonly mode, the listbox will not allow selection of options.

properties.name: forceSelect
properties.description:
Whether or not to force selection of options as a separate action.
If this is set, focusing on an option will not select it. You have to press "Space" to select the option.
If this is unset, focusing an option will select it.
Note that this will be ignored if the `aria-multiselectable` attribute is set to `"true"`.

properties.name: multiSelect
properties.description: Sets whether the listbox is in single-select or multi-select mode.

properties.name: readonly
properties.description: Sets the listbox to readonly mode - in readonly mode, the listbox will not allow selection of options.

slots.description: Default slot should contain one or more {@link Option} elements.

attributes.name: aria-selected
attributes.description: Indicates the selected state of the option.

attributes.name: aria-disabled
attributes.description: Sets the option as disabled. If `true`, the option will not respond to any events.

properties.name: selected
properties.description: Indicates the selected state of the option.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Sets the option as disabled. If `true`, the option will not respond to any events.

events.name: ex:optionselect
events.description:
When the `ex:optionselect` is dispatched against an option, the option will change its `selected` property (`aria-selected`) to reflect the detail of the event.
                  Event detail should be:
                  ```
                  {
                      selected?: boolean,
                      toggle?: boolean,
                  }
                  ```
